A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film had the highest highs of any Star Wars film.  But\, it was not without it's issues.  The strengths far outweigh the problems\, but a lot of other audience reviews seem to be caught up in the small stuff.  If you go into this expecting a wikipedia-esque explanation of the questions left by The Force Awakens you will be disappointed.  This film is content to focus more on strong character arcs and stunning visuals than get tied down in minutia.  It has hands-down the best acting of any star wars film and is at once the most serious and humorous of the lot.
